_meta.description: PRISM Labs service catalog. Premium marketplace tools — vendors register at prism.marc27.com/labs.

alab_synthesis.name: A-Lab Autonomous Synthesis
alab_synthesis.description: Closed-loop autonomous materials synthesis. AI proposes compositions, robots synthesize and characterize, results feed back. Targets oxide and phosphate compounds from Materials Project predictions.

kebotix_discovery.name: Kebotix Automated Discovery
kebotix_discovery.description: ChemOS-powered automated R&D. AI-driven experiment design with robotic execution. Handles multi-objective optimization, constraint satisfaction, and retrosynthetic pathway prediction.

matlantis_dft.name: Matlantis Cloud DFT
matlantis_dft.description: Ultra-fast universal neural network potential. 100,000x faster than classical DFT for structures up to 20,000 atoms. Covers 72 elements. REST API with Jupyter integration.

mat3ra_platform.name: Mat3ra Simulation Platform
mat3ra_platform.description: End-to-end cloud materials modeling. Integrates VASP, Quantum ESPRESSO, LAMMPS with ML workflows. REST API for job submission, monitoring, and result retrieval.

hqs_quantum.name: HQS Quantum Chemistry
hqs_quantum.description: HQStage modular quantum simulation toolkit. 10 simulation modules for quantum chemistry on real quantum hardware or classical emulators. Battery materials, photocatalysts, novel compounds.

aqt_quantum.name: AQT ARNICA Quantum Computing
aqt_quantum.description: Cloud access to trapped-ion quantum computers via ARNICA platform. Simulate material properties that are intractable for classical DFT. Strong decoherence resistance.
capabilities: Quantum advantage for strongly correlated systems

dfm_assessment.name: Materials DfM Assessment
dfm_assessment.description: Design for Manufacturability assessment for novel materials. Evaluates synthesis feasibility, scalability, cost projections, and identifies manufacturing risks. Domain-specific rules for ceramics, alloys, thin films, and composites.

synchrotron_ssrl.name: SSRL Beamtime Booking
synchrotron_ssrl.description: Book beamtime at SSRL for X-ray diffraction, scattering, absorption spectroscopy, and microscopy. 30 experimental stations. Remote access available.

ht_screening.name: High-Throughput Screening
ht_screening.description: Combinatorial high-throughput materials screening. Automated synthesis of composition libraries, rapid characterization, and ML-guided iteration. Covers alloys, oxides, and thin-film systems.
